name: Unbridled
description: When you score 4+ Hits on an Inferno roll, all targets in the targetted Zone suffer the Hits.

name: Inextinguishable
description: When you make an Inferno roll and score 0 Hits, add +2 Hits to the result.

name: Singing
description: Your Inferno rolls score +1 Bonus Hits.

name: Igniting
description: When you score 4+ Hits on an Inferno roll, you create 1 Hazard in the targetted Zone until the flames are extinguished.

name: Parching
description: When you score 3+ Hits on an Inferno roll, your target gains Fatigued 1.

name: Scorching
description: Your Inferno rolls score +1 Bonus Hits.

name: Blinding
description: When you score 3+ Hits on a Lux roll, your target gains Blind.

name: Illuminating
description: When you use a Lux power on an ally, your ally loses Blind.
When you score 3+ Hits on a Mentis roll, your target gains Consued.

name: Enshrouding
description: When you score 3+ Hits on a Nox roll, gain Hidden 2.
When you make an Nox roll and score 0 Hits, add +2 Hits to the result.
When you use the Recover Action and score 0 Hits, add +2 Hits to the result.
When you make an Rime roll and score 0 Hits, add +2 Hits to the result.
When you score 3+ Hits on an Rime roll, you create 1 Hazard in the targetted Zone until the flames are extinguished.
